titleStmt.title: A learned and godly sermon preached at Worcester, at an assise / by the reverend and learned, Miles Smith ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, Miles, d. 1624.
Burhill, Robert, 1572-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold in Fleet-street at the signe of the Turkes head by Iohn Barnes,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
